Header: Several deaths reported due to motor accidents within the course of the day
Content: 4 persons were killed while another 43 injured in several motor accidents that occurred throughout the island today. 2 persons killed when a Jaffna bound private bus from Colombo overturned after colliding with a lorry in Mankulam, Kilinochchi early this morning. Police Media spokesmanâ€™s Office stated that 21 persons who received injuries following the accident were admitted to Kilinochchi Hospital. Meanwhile, a 32-year old three wheel driver was killed when his three wheeler collided with a truck at Navagamuwa area on the Colombo - Avissawella road this morning. At the same time, a motor cyclist was killed when his motor cycle collided with a lorry at Beliatta in Hambantota today. In addition, 22 persons were hospitalized when a truck in which they were traveling overturned at Pottuwil town this afternoon. Police Media Spokesman office stated that the passengers in the truck are residents of Siyambalanduwa, who were on a trip to Arugambay.
